settings.detectedDescription: ** Do not share this information publicly **
settings.confirmSend:
Send the log contents to the developer?
** All identifiers will be removed **
settings.logSendFailed:
Failed to send after 5 attempts.
The error messages are at the end of the log.
settings.enableLogExplanation:
If enabled, the app will log a lot of diagnostics information.
The app will still log errors even if this is disabled.
settings.emailExplanation: If you want me to respond to your log, please enter your email address or forum id here so I know how to contact you.
settings.descriptionExplanation: Please enter a brief description of the problem if you are going to send the log.
settings.sendLogConfirm: Send the log contents to the developer?
settings.intro: The app has a built in MQTT broker that can be used or you can select another external broker.
